subtopics.name: Importance of system design
subtopics.content: In today's digital world, system design has become an essential skill for software engineers and other professionals working in the tech industry. System design involves the process of designing, developing, and deploying a system that is capable of fulfilling a specific set of requirements. It is a complex process that requires a deep understanding of the system's architecture and its components.

subtopics.name: Principles of good system design
subtopics.content: Principles of good system design form the foundation for creating efficient, reliable, and scalable systems. These principles guide the design process, ensuring that the resulting system meets the needs of users and stakeholders while being maintainable and adaptable.

subtopics.name: System design process overview
subtopics.content: The system design process involves translating requirements into a well-structured system architecture. It begins with analyzing and understanding user needs and system requirements. Next, the system's high-level structure is defined, identifying key components and their interactions. Detailed design decisions are then made, including module interfaces, algorithms, data structures, and technologies.
